name: Steal and Escape (TalalMeshari)
description:
This game is about you (the player) inside a grocery store and you have to steal items there to escape. The store is guarded by 1 alien who is part of a group of aliens that invaded our planet.

Steal as many items as you can with your cart and try to escape!

Note: I wanna thank everyone who made this Game Jam. This is my first game jam and I learned so much from making this game. I now know things about game development that I would not have known if I hadn't joined this jam. Thank you so much <3
